thread.section_title: Albergo del Senato - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, wonderful staff, pleasing accomodations
thread.title_full: Great location, wonderful staff, pleasing accomodations - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Angela N
title: Great location, wonderful staff, pleasing accomodations
text: Recently stayed double superior room for two adults; directly faced the Pantheon, and Piazza della Rotunda; lively piazza durning the day, but no issues with noise late at night. Breakfast was fresh and abundant; dinner not served in the hotel, but many good choices nearby. The staff made several recommendations for dinner, and we were never disappointed. Nice rooftop seating area, with bar service seasonally. Ideally located for touring major sites, and very pleasant, helpful staff. Highly recommend this property. Grazie!
